critique: The document is an executive order from President Franklin D. Roosevelt adding land to the Waubay Migratory Waterfowl Refuge in South Dakota. It focuses on land acquisition for conservation purposes. There is no explicit discussion of immigration, executive power, federalism, security, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores are neutral. The document reflects a slight inclination towards environmental protection, which can be seen as a moderately liberal position.
